name: The Last Gift
description:
Aunt Adeline is dead, you inherit her house. While you explore it, memories arise.... 

Team :

Edith Abouquir (Game design)

Emma Bernard (Game design)

Ivan Dubreucq (2d art)

Mohan Grewis (Game development)

Augustin Leconte (Game development)

Sylvain Lérin-Fallièro (2d art)

Clément Robert (Game development)

Estelle Rostan (Game development)

Adrien Rostan (Runner)

Maeva Yon (Sound design / music)

A small game made in the Global Game Jam 2019

The theme of the Global Game jam was "What means Home to you"
